THAT Lab

Investigating Perspectives on the Potential of AI Powered Interfaces for People with Dementia

Performed a secondary thematic analysis of data from interviews with people living with dementia to discuss future directions for the design of AI-driven adaptive interfaces for supporting different types of memory.

Publications: CHI 2022 (To Appear),
Code Repos:
Tags: #AI, #Dementia, #Auto Personalization, #Accessibility, #Qualtitative Methods, #Thematic Analysis,
